DOC.brief_summary: To determine palatability and extent to which escalating doses of a novel highly viscous polysaccharide [NVP] reduces postprandial glycemia when added to a liquid and a solid meal.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Escalating Doses of a Novel Viscous Polysaccharide on Postprandial Glycemia
DOC.criteria: healthy individuals 1875 years old BMI less than 35 kg/m2 Medications influencing gastrointestinal function Pregnancy
